TopicTitle: I feel strange in this forum!!

Articles.Content:
Hi , as the title say , I feel strange

like someone deleting my posts

sometimes I see the post that I post disappear

can anyone explain

Well if it's offtopic it'll get deleted and i don't think you have to be told. There's also the possibility your net is bad and not actually sending your posts correctly.

Also, this is in the wrong section of the forum.

Well if it's offtopic it'll get deleted and i don't think you have to be told. There's also the possibility your net is bad and not actually sending your posts correctly.

Also, this is in the wrong section of the forum.

Should I post it in questions section

but the post been sent and my off topic posts is only forum games

I guess it should be in Kerbal Network - don't repost it though a mod can move it for you.

I'm sure you're just being paranoid don't worry ;-)

I guess it should be in Kerbal Network - don't repost it though a mod can move it for you.

I'm sure you're just being paranoid don't worry ;-)

Ok thank you

Moved to Kerbal Network.

If your post is in breach of the [thread=30064]Community Rules[/thread] it is quite possible it may be deleted. On such cases, you should be given sent a notice via PM, or if the breach is more serious, an infraction.

Otherwise, it's possible that something's going on between your computer and the Multiplay servers (who host the KSP website and forums, IIRC), causing the posts to mysteriously go missing. That is unlikely, however.

If you notice any missing posts, feel free to contact a moderator over the issue. If they were deleted for any reason, we should be able to see them. Otherwise, something else odd must be going on.
I'm using sometimes iPad , does it support
I've heard of no users having problems with an iPad before, so I don't think it should have any issues.

I've heard of no users having problems with an iPad before, so I don't think it should have any issues.

I can back up this. I do most browsing on an iPad, and no problems have arisen
